channel.title: Any way of adding Dragon claws spec gfx/animation without 525+ cache?
channel.description: Title says most of it, i'v searched and searched for a way to do this, i like using the 474 cache that i got, but for the life of my i can figure out if there is a way to add the special emote and gfx for it :\.

item.title: Any way of adding Dragon claws spec gfx/animation without 525+ cache?
item.dc:creator: @Viva_La_Ace Viva La Ace
item.description:
@Viva_La_Ace wrote:

sk8rdude461:

Sure, rip the specific anims and gfx and data from the 525+ cache and then put it in yours, you may have to modify some of the code to read the anims/gfx properly.

Alright! sounds somewhat simple enough, i’ll see if i can do it! Thanks.

Edit : hmm i feel like im fairly close. i got the animation for the claws, and i looked up a few ways of loading the animation in the cache with skinlist and frames folder… and i got it loaded through animation.java (i think). but saddly its not working :(.

Edit 2 : I think i figured out my problem. will figure out when i get home.

Read full topic
item.source: Any way of adding Dragon claws spec gfx/animation without 525+ cache?
